00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 #include <ace/Version.h>
00028 #if ACE_MAJOR_VERSION >= 5 && ACE_MINOR_VERSION >= 2
00029 #  include <ace/Atomic_Op.h>
00030 #else
00031 #  include <ace/Synch_T.h>
00032 #endif
00033 #include <string>
00034 #include <sstream>
00035 
00036 typedef ACE_Atomic_Op<ACE_Mutex, unsigned int> counter_t;
00037 
00038 class Count {
00039 protected:
00043   counter_t counter_;
00044 public:
00047   Count() { counter_ = 0; }
00048 
00051     Count(counter_t &counter): counter_(counter) {}
00052 
00056     Count(string str) {
00057     counter_ = atol(str.c_str());
00058     }
00059 
00062     void operator++(int) { ++counter_; }
00063 
00066     void operator--(int) { --counter_; }
00067   
00070     unsigned int val() { return counter_.value(); }
00071 
00074   void set(unsigned int val) { counter_ = val; }
00075 
00081     string insertString() {
00082         stringstream result;
00083         result << counter_.value();
00084         return result.str();
00085     }
00086 
00094     string updateString() {
00095         stringstream result;
00096         result << " count = " << counter_.value();
00097         return result.str();
00098     }
00099 };

00101 #endif // COUNT_H
